appDescription.message: This extension opens predefined websites on click, and closes non-listed domains on double-click.

editWebsites.description: The heading for the website editing section.

howToUse.description: The title for the instruction section.

instruction1.message: Single click on the extension icon to open all websites listed below in new tabs.
instruction1.description: The first part of the instruction.

instruction2.message: Double click on the extension icon to close all tabs that are not included in the website list.
instruction2.description: The second part of the instruction.

reverseBehavior.description: The label for the reverse behavior switch.

reverseOff.message: When not reversed, double-clicking will close all tabs that are not in the list above.
reverseOff.description: The explanation text for when the reverse behavior is off.

reverseOn.message: When reversed, double-clicking will close all tabs for domains and subdomains listed above.
reverseOn.description: The explanation text for when the reverse behavior is on.

addWebsite.description: The text on the Add Website button.

save.description: The text on the Save button.

websitesSaved.description: The alert text for when the websites are saved.

buyMeACoffee.description: Footer link label to Buy Me A Coffee page.

twitter.description: Footer link label to Twitter page.

github.description: Footer link label to GitHub page.
